name: Srdjan 'Zika' Todorovic
summary: Srdjan 'Zika' Todorovic. Actor: A Serbian Film. Srdjan 'Zika' Todorovic was born on 28 March 1965 in Belgrade, Serbia, Yugoslavia. He is an actor, known for A Serbian Film (2010), Black Cat, White Cat (1998) and Underground (1995). He has been married to Ana Todorovic since 2004. They have one child.
